items.title: Automotive market headwinds offset by AI servers; Eikei sees US liquid cooling board orders surge in 3Q25
items.summary: Automotive market challenges are being balanced out by demand for AI servers, with Eikei experiencing a surge in orders for liquid cooling boards in the US in 3Q25. Eikei chairman mentioned that the impact of tariffs and exchange rates has lessened, leading to stabilization in customer orders.
